title: Anna Finds a Home
description: Barbara C. Koldon's Anna Finds a Home is a warmhearted and beautifully illustrated children's book about a female puppy, named Anna, who is growing up in a good kennel, but longs to be part of a human family, and one day gets her wish. Hard cover books are also available by calling the BookSurge orders line at 1-866-308-6235 ext. 5120.
author: Barbara C. Koldon
